title: Analyze E-Scooter Usage Patterns
description: A city planner wants to understand where shared e-scooters are most frequently used to plan for new bike lanes.

tasks.description: Retrieve all e-scooter trip data (start and end points) for the last 3 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully queries the micromobility database.

tasks.description: Generate a heatmap visualization of the most popular trip routes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a map showing the most heavily trafficked corridors.

tasks.description: Export the heatmap and underlying data for the transportation planning department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a report for the planners.
